alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 01 at 12:33PM MST until January 02 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Davenport, Coeur d`Alene, Downtown Spokane, Hayden, Post Falls, Fairfield, Spokane Valley, Airway Heights, Cheney, Worley, and Rockford. * WHEN...Until noon PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Fog is expected to impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will see some improvement Monday afternoon before becoming dense again Monday night into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
